Description: Verify that bookmarks appear at the standard(4) access points

Verify that view properties works as appropriate for bookmarks,
      folders, and separators(negative)

Determine if the application and OS properly
      handle items dragged from the Bookmark Manager
Determine whether International Users displays correctly

Determine whether X Bitmap (XBM) format images can be displayed.Note: XBM will not be supported in the initial 5.0
          release.
Verify that nothing changes when you cancel

Feature: Local file in an editor window
Description:
Open local files (both HTML and plain text tested) in a Composer
        window. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.

Feature: Verify all the selectable items work under Modern theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar, tool bars, and floating
        component bar under Modern theme
